titleStmt.title: The Readinesse of the Scots to advance into England the policie and practise of the French agent there to hinder it : exprest in three propositions, together with an act of the Privie Councell there : as also, instructions from the Committee of Estates to the colonels and committees of warre in the severall sheriffedoms of that kingdom.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Instructions from the committee of estates to the colonells and committees of warre in the severall sheriffedoms of this kingdom.
Scotland. Privy Council.
